title: Jan Dukes de Grey - Mice and Rats in the Loft - slavetothesound
description:
This is an interesting prog. rock album from 1971. I bought it originally because it was shortly after I heard Comus&#039; First Utterance album and I had seen it compared in an article as one of the prog rock albums as great as First Utterance, which I would strongly disagree with. That doesn&#039;t mean it&#039;s not worth a listen though, and many might think it is that good. It was really hard to find a copy of the album so I&#039;m putting it up here so no one else has to go through the trouble. And if anyone&#039;s got Comus in lossless, please put it up here for us  My low bitrate mp3 version is getting old.

Track list:
01. Sun Symphonica [0:18:58.08]
02. Call of the Wild [0:12:48.24]
03. Mice and Rats in the Loft [0:08:19.09]

Also, I can upload covers for all the albums I&#039;ve uploaded so far, but I haven&#039;t got a scanner so I&#039;d have to use my digital camera. Not sure if that makes a difference really but leave a request if you need them..

- slavetothesound
